title: Add integrate test cases for appending Columns.
body:
Fixes #601 .

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- SELECT *, order_id, o.* FROM t_order o ORDER BY o.order_id
- SELECT o.* FROM t_order o ORDER BY o.order_id
- SELECT * FROM t_order o ORDER BY order_id
- SELECT t_order.* FROM t_order ORDER BY t_order.order_id
- SELECT * FROM t_order ORDER BY order_id
- SELECT i.*, o.* FROM t_order o JOIN t_order_item i ON o.user_id = i.user_id AND o.order_id = i.order_id ORDER BY item_id

Add the above SQL cases, parser results, integrate cases, excepted files.

title: Support props config for MasterSlave rule.
body:
Fixes #1004 .

To config props for MasterSlave rule, not just for Sharding rule, we need to do work as follows:
    Add modules in Sharding core.
    Support it in Sharding JDBC and Yaml.
    Support it in Spring namespace.
    Support it in Spring boots.
    Support it in Sharding Proxy.
    Support to store the props config in registry.
    Modify release note.

- Move package io.shardingsphere.dbtest.cases.authority to io.shardingsphere.dbtest.env.authority.

title: Support authorization parsing for Sharding core
body:
Fixes #980 #992 .

Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Add SQL Parsing for DCL statement in Sharding-Core.
- Add unit test cases for DCL statement.
- To replace DataSourceName with actual database name to optimize the SQL routing of SHOW COLUMNS FROM TABLE FROM SCHEMA.

repo.name: shardingsphere
repo.description: Empowering Data Intelligence with Distributed SQL for Sharding, Scalability, and Security Across All Databases.

title: use execute instead of executeQuery in getTableNamesFromDefaultDataSo…
body:
Hi!

Similarly to what happened in #852, the usage of `executeQuery` when retrieving the tables metadata in `MySQLShardingMetaDataHandler.getTableNamesFromDefaultDataSource` broke the application startup when using c3p0 as thread pool.

Cheers!

### Changes proposed in this pull request:
- Use `execute` instead of `executeQuery` in `MySQLShardingMetaDataHandler.getTableNamesFromDefaultDataSource`

repo.name: shardingsphere
repo.description: Empowering Data Intelligence with Distributed SQL for Sharding, Scalability, and Security Across All Databases.
